title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Chris Simms' QB list issues; Jerry has a Zeke problem; AFC North O/U; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Chris Simms' QB list issues; Jerry has a Zeke problem; AFC North O/U; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.

In this episode, Middlekauff explains why former NFL QB and current analyst Chris Simms' controversial QB list is ridiculous on a number of levels, his top QB's, why the Jerry Jones and the Cowboys have reason to be concerned about Zeke Elliott despite him avoiding suspension in his latest incident. He also gives his AFC North O/U picks, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
